topic.title: Transfer Funds Using Qbank Mobile App
topic.shortdesc: Step-by-step instructions for transferring money between accounts using the Qbank Mobile App.

ol.li: Launch the Qbank Mobile App and log in
Tap Transfer from the bottom navigation
Select the source and destination accounts
Enter the amount and optional memo

section.title: Result
section.p: Funds are transferred instantly unless flagged for review.

section.title: Common Errors
section.p: Insufficient Funds: Verify account balance before submitting.
Transfer Limit Exceeded: Check your daily transfer cap in Settings.
